comment: /**  * Create a statement in this connection. Allows implementations to use  * PreparedStatements. The JdbcTemplate will close the created statement.  * @param con the connection used to create statement  * @return a prepared statement  * @throws SQLException there is no need to catch SQLExceptions  * that may be thrown in the implementation of this method.  * The JdbcTemplate class will handle them.  */
code: /**  * Create a statement in this connection. Allows implementations to use  * PreparedStatements. The JdbcTemplate will close the created statement.  * @param con the connection used to create statement  * @return a prepared statement  * @throws SQLException there is no need to catch SQLExceptions  * that may be thrown in the implementation of this method.  * The JdbcTemplate class will handle them.  */ PreparedStatement createPreparedStatement(Connection con) throws SQLException.
